name: E-Stop
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched bigfont rounded" style="background-color:#333333" ng-click="send({payload: msg.payload })"> 


<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xml:space="preserve" width="210px" height="210px" version="1.1" shape-rendering="geometricPrecision" text-rendering="geometricPrecision" image-rendering="optimizeQuality" fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd"
viewBox="0 0 304 304"
 xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
 <g id="Layer_x0020_1">
  <g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) % 2 === 0 ? 'red' : '#B80000'}">
    <circle  stroke="#A10000" stroke-width="2.08345" cx="152" cy="152" r="150"/>
  </g>
  <path fill="#A10000" stroke="#A10000" stroke-width="4.00037" d="M152 2c83,0 150,67 150,150 0,83 -67,150 -150,150 -83,0 -150,-67 -150,-150 0,-83 67,-150 150,-150zm0 28c67,0 122,55 122,122 0,67 -55,122 -122,122 -67,0 -122,-55 -122,-122 0,-67 55,-122 122,-122z"/>
  <path fill="#B80000" stroke="#A10000" stroke-width="2.08345" d="M152 2c83,0 150,67 150,150 0,83 -67,150 -150,150 -83,0 -150,-67 -150,-150 0,-83 67,-150 150,-150zm0 13c76,0 137,61 137,137 0,76 -61,137 -137,137 -76,0 -137,-61 -137,-137 0,-76 61,-137 137,-137z"/>

  <g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) % 2 === 0 ? '#FEFEFE' : '000'}">
    <text x="150" y="139"  style="text-anchor:middle" font-weight="bold" font-size="99.9999" font-family="Arial">E</text>
  </g>
  <g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) % 2 === 0 ? '#FEFEFE' : '000'}">
    <text x="155" y="219"  style="text-anchor:middle" font-weight="bold" font-size="66.6658" font-family="Arial">STOP</text>
  </g>
 
  <g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) % 2 === 0 ? 'none' : '#FEFEFE'}">
    <text x="150" y="125"  style="text-anchor:middle" font-weight="bold" font-size="50.0" font-family="Arial">TAP TO</text>
  </g>
  <g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) % 2 === 0 ? 'none' : '#FEFEFE'}">
    <text x="152" y="215"  style="text-anchor:middle" font-weight="bold" font-size="50.0" font-family="Arial">RESET</text>
  </g>



 </g>
</svg>
</md-button>
